title: Re: Alien Carnage Released as Freeware
content:
NICE! I remember Alien Carnage being one of the greatest games that I could never get to run properly. I did a few times but then as computers got "better" it stopped working. (That, Zone 66 and Tyrian until Tyrian 2000 came out.)

I should give it a go on DosBox now... I don't think my computer would be fast enough to emulate it properly though.-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

title: Re: Alien Carnage Released as Freeware
content:

I've never played this game before. I should try it.------------------------------
